resources.string:
Pondy Tourism app provides different language support including Hindi, English, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam for better reach to the place. It provides relevant information about concerned places. It's easy to use as its UI navigation is straight forward. You can find different categories of places like Temples, Beaches, Museums, Lakes, and gardens, etc. Hope it will give you boost your travel activity.

 Developed By: 
Rakesh Kumar
Nasimul Gani

Happy Tourism.
